mdRecord.dcterms:title: Social facts and forces: the factory, the labor union, the corporation, the railway, the city, the church
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gladden, Washington, 1836-1918
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lectures give in 1895-96 in Steinway Hall, Chicago, as the "Ryder lectures" and repeated the next year as the E.A. Rand course on applied Christianity, before the students of Iowa College and the citizens of Grinnell, Iowa.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Original maroon cloth. From the Library of Edwin A. Alderman, with his bookplate.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Alderman, Edwin Anderson, 1861-1931--Library--Personal copy.
Social problems
United States--Social conditions.
